name: Fairy Dodge Remastered!!!!
description:
Just like before but better.

Instructions: Arrow keys to move, Z to shoot, To shoot and move just hold down Z then move.

There will be more updates on the game. If you have any recommendations the put them in the comments please. I will greatly appreciate your feedback.

Original music made by my sister. Piano version made by me.

I DO NOT OWN ANY CHARTERS IN THIS GAME ALL RIGHTS GO TO ZUN.
